name: Tea Tastes Better on the Moon
name_original: Tea Tastes Better on the Moon
description:
STORY:

Scary Moonchild receives an invitation from Friendly Cosmonaut to have tea on the moon. Only... there seems to be some confusion about which moon.

As Scary Moonchild tries to find her way, she must traverse different environments and battle with monsters. And if she's lucky, meet some friends along the way. 

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move.
Down to duck.
Down + move to slide.
Space or Up Arrow to jump.
S to attack (punch on ground, kick in air).
E to progress through dialogue.
P to "pause" and bring up the invitation.
0 to switch to alternate controls (below).

ALTERNATE CONTROLS (hit 0 to switch to these)

WASD to move, duck, slide, jump.
Space to attack.
All else the same.

Updates: alternate controls as per requested :). mac version coming soon
